entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries or periods of drizzle ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 3. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Thursday 4 May 2023
